TopicTitle: 3d Modeler needed - Creating a pack with the future in mind

Articles.Content:
Hey guys ... I want to start work on a project that takes full advantage of a popular plug in (Dont worry I have the go ahead from the creator of the plug in)

BUT I cant even make a simple fuel tank in blender - I can make textures, and write .CFG files (Might need to ask a few questions here and there .. but eh)

So what I am looking for is someone to do the 3d and animation part of this project (animation is planned for down the track)

The first phase will be just some simple shapes (like fuel tank like shapes)

But later phases will have things that look like hour glasses, and if at all possible hollow structures ...

If your interested ... Drop me a PM
